message:
CONVERSATION 1:
Her: wtf. what drug are you on?. how is ben barnes anything but a 10000000000000000/10?.
Him: in the prince caspian movies i mean. not ben barnes in general.
CONVERSATION
Her: seriously, are you blind or something?
Him: Maybe I should get my eyes checked... but I am 10000000000000000/10 for appreciating your taste in actors, right? 😂

CONVERSATION 2:
Her: omg, have you lost all sense of reality?
Him: in the prince caspian movies i mean. not ben barnes in general.
CONVERSATION
Her: you must be living in Narnia if you can't see his perfection!
Him: Well, then I guess the world needs more Narnians like me, appreciating otherworldly talents! 😏

CONVERSATION 3:
Her: I can't even with you right now. You don't understand art.
Him: in the prince caspian movies i mean. not ben barnes in general.
CONVERSATION
Her: you're missing out on some epic aesthetics, my friend.
Him: Guess I'll stick to average aesthetics while you enjoy your majestic prince. Let's call it balance, shall we? 😅

CONVERSATION 4:
Her: Seriously, do you have no taste whatsoever?
Him: in the prince caspian movies i mean. not ben barnes in general.
CONVERSATION
Her: I guess beauty is subjective, but your taste is definitely an acquired taste.
Him: Just trying to keep things interesting, you know? Can't let everyone have the same boring preferences. 🙃

CONVERSATION 5:
Her: Are you insane? How can you not see his perfection?
Him: in the prince caspian movies i mean. not ben barnes in general.
CONVERSATION
Her: Clearly, you need a lesson in appreciating true beauty.
Him: Enlighten me, oh wise connoisseur of all things Prince Caspian. Teach me your ways to see beyond the abs! 😂
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)
    ,
    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : wtf. what drug are you on?. how is ben barnes anything but a 10000000000000000/10?.  
    Him : Him : in the prince caspian movies i mean. not ben barnes in general. 
    
    The 5 Conversations must have unique messages for her and him. The prompt for 'her' must be different everytime.
